title: Hello. Please tell me. Is it safe to buy in store the Google store?
content: I want to buy a gift for my wife, Google pixel 5. But I'm worried that my card data may be lost and get to another person. Tell me how many cards can I add to purchase Google devices? Which Bank cards do you accept for payment? Can I buy 2 devices at once? Can I add my wife's Bank card? Can I add a card that is registered in another state?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
